Hero.headline: <accent>Minimalist</accent> websites that make your business stand out.
Hero.subtitle: Choose a template, send your content, and publish quickly with quality. Clean visuals, performance, and responsiveness.

About.title: Who we are
About.subtitle: Design and code working together for minimalist, fast, and essential websites.
About.p1: Formwise Studio was born to remove the complexity of website creation and focus on what matters: clarity, performance, and minimalist aesthetics. We combine design and engineering to deliver ready-made, polished, and easy-to-customize templates ‚Äî without noise.
About.p2: Our proposal is simple: you choose a template, send your content, and we adjust the identity. The result is a light, beautiful, and functional website.
About.quote: ‚ÄúLess ornament, more intention. Every block exists to communicate your business better.‚Äù

cards.title: Quick customization
cards.desc: Colors, typography, and content aligned with your brand.

About.cta: See how it works to get your template

items.title: Professional look

items.title: Fast & responsive
items.desc: Loads fast and adapts from mobile to desktop.

Steps.title: How it works
Steps.subtitle: A clear timeline: what we do, what you prepare, and the estimated time per step.
Steps.summary: Average publication time: ~4‚Äì5 days after receiving all content. Fine-tuning and initial support included.

Provide your contact channels (WhatsApp, email, socials)

Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Formwise Studio (‚Äúwe‚Äù) collects, uses, and protects your information when using our website and services.

sections.title: 1. Information we collect
items: Contact details you provide (e.g., name, email, phone).
Content and preferences for building your site.
Basic technical usage data (e.g., pages visited, device, cookies).

sections.title: 2. How we use your data
items: To fulfill requests, send proposals, and provide support.
To build, customize, and publish your site as requested.
To improve navigation experience and our offers.

sections.title: 3. Legal basis and consent
sections.text: We process your data based on your consent and/or service agreements, in accordance with applicable laws (including GDPR/LGPD).

sections.title: 4. Cookies and similar technologies
sections.text: We may use cookies to remember preferences and understand site usage. You can manage cookies in your browser. If we use analytics tools, they may collect aggregated navigation data.

sections.title: 5. Data sharing
sections.text: We don‚Äôt sell your data. We may share it with service providers necessary for operation (e.g., hosting, email, analytics), always with security measures and only for the purposes described here.

sections.title: 6. Information security
sections.text: We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect your data. No method is 100% infallible, but we follow market best practices.

sections.title: 7. Your rights
sections.text: You can request access, correction, update, or deletion of your data, and revoke consent. To exercise your rights, please contact us.

sections.title: 9. Policy updates
sections.text: We may update this document at any time. The new version will be published on this page.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.intro: By accessing our website and/or using our services, you agree to these Terms of Use. Please read carefully.

sections.title: 1. Services
sections.text: We offer website templates and customization/publishing services. Scope, timelines, and pricing are defined in a specific proposal for each project.

sections.title: 2. Client content
sections.text: You are responsible for the content provided (texts, images, trademarks). By sending it, you declare that you have the rights necessary for its use and publication.

sections.title: 3. Publishing and domain
sections.text: We assist in site publishing and domain configuration. Domain registration/renewal and hosting/platform costs may be the client‚Äôs responsibility, as agreed.

sections.title: 4. Payments
sections.text: Payment terms are defined in the proposal. In case of delay, the delivery schedule may be adjusted.

sections.title: 5. Intellectual property
sections.text: Templates and materials developed by us are licensed for your use under the contracted plan. Redistribution or resale without authorization is prohibited.

sections.title: 6. Limitation of liability
sections.text: We are not responsible for third-party outages, data loss from external services, or indirect damages from site use. We make reasonable efforts to maintain service quality and continuity.

sections.title: 7. Cancellation
sections.text: You may request cancellation at any time. Refund conditions, if any, will be assessed based on the project stage and agreed proposal.

sections.title: 8. Changes to these Terms
sections.text: We may update these Terms periodically. The current version will always be published on this page.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.text: If you have questions, contact us at formwisestudio@gmail.com

Footer.tagline: Minimalist, fast, and beautiful websites ‚Äî ready to make your business stand out.
